website_summaries.verdict: A durable plug that works great with Alexa, Google Home, and other smart home devices.
pros: Comes with a mobile app that enables you to manage your devices from any location and at any time and supports voice control
Enables you to automatically turn lights on or off when you leave or arrive at home
Supports a 2.4 GHz WiFi network and works with AC 110 to 240 volts
Simple to set up in just minutes
cons: Much bigger than many comparable smart plugs

customer_reviews.title: Product works great once you get by the setup
customer_reviews.text: Product works great once you get by the setup. The setup to Smart Life is somewhat easy, but to connect to Echo is very challenging to say the least. I tried everything including talking to Amazon support who was not able to get me connected. My son-in law was able to get me connected after several attempts. I would give this product a five hands down but the connection to Echo I would have to give a 2, sorry but instructions not clear. If you are not technically savvy stay away from these devices. Again, once connected they work great and 5 stars plus or better. Seller is great, and will offer better instructions for connecting to Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Wormwood

customer_reviews.title: Work great, easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: My wife always has her Christmas lights throughout the house on remote controls. We must have 3 or 4 different remotes with different channels and the buttons wear out quickly and quit working. I decided to try using smart outlets this year. They work great with our Amazon Echos. I have 6 of them deployed for the Christmas lighting and put them in a group so all my wife needs to do is tell Alexa to turn on/off the Christmas lights. Not finding the right remote for the right string of lights. These are so convenient! My one complaint is that they are a bit large and partialy cover the second outlet enough to prevent it from being used.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these wireless plugs and they are easy to set up with your WIFI system and your smart phone. I have not yet successfully been able to set them up with my echo dot, even though I mainly did want to do that so that I could just say "Alexa, please turn off the guest room light". I have not spent a lot of time dealing with this and hope to be successful in the couple of weeks. Perhaps I can update this post with good news later this month....
customer_reviews.author: proxxie

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time just getting the app to work on my phone, but These plugs from Hugoia DO NOT work with Alexa. Defeats the purpose of having them.
customer_reviews.author: Chip P

customer_reviews.title: Makes turning lights on/off a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these outlets just to test them out in our bedroom to see how well they worked with Alexa. Setup was a little confusing, but not bad. You just have to set them up on the Smart Outlet app and then Alexa. Now it's just "Alexa, turn lights on/off" and it works great. I plan to order several more for other rooms. I believe some reviews said that there wasn't room for another cord in the outlet when you plug one of these in, but we had no problems with plugging in another regular cord. UPDATE on 2/20/19: I have now bought a total of 8 of these and they’re all still working great!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Easy Instal!
customer_reviews.text: We got these to be able to turn a few lamps on/off when we go on vacation so our house looks occupied. These are SO easy to install...it took me less than 10 minutes to download the app, register and install all 4 plugs on lamps around the house. Connected to my WiFi with no problem at all. Setting up timers is really easy too. My only complaint is that you cannot set up a daily schedule for the timer - would be nice for customization. But other than that - super happy with purchase and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RWellins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smart outlets!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my second set of these awesome little outlets. They were the cheapest I could find on Amazon, and they work beautifully. I have plugged several room lights into them as well as my Christmas tree, and Alexa makes it so easy to control them. I can turn all the lights in the house on or off from anywhere by just saying, "Alexa, turn off the lights." I couldn't love it more. Note - we did at first have trouble setting up one of the outlets. I don't know what we were doing wrong, but after an hour or so, it started working and has been fine now for weeks. I highly recommend these very affordable smart outlets!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ziegmont

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm,I love it! They are really really easy to set up with Smart life APP and also works really well on my Google Home. I ordered two plugs, one for my living room lamp and one for my bedroom lamp.When I go to bed,I can ask Google to turn off the bedroom lamp. Before I get home, I use smartphone APP to turn on the living room so that I can come home to a lighted house,these things have made me feel more secure and safer. Just bought another 4 packs plugs,I can't wait for to use it with my another home devices! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: These are handy. I have several lamps I hooked them up to. I also have some lights under my pergola that I plugged them into. I can just say Alexa pergola and bam they are on. Don’t have to go on the patio and plug them in. Same with the lamps. Two are upstairs in a guest room. When company is here I already have them on and show them how to say Alexa lamps off. They are impressed. 👍 all in all a really good way to have a smart home by just plugging in items to these plugs and using Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, had problem setting up first but I recommend using the slow setting on the app which is on the right hand corner that says compat.... click on it and would put you on the slow setting. On the device, push the button until the device you plugged in turns off and on and that would make the device blink slowly. You could control the plugs using both google and Alexa, recommend google assistant as I use it to turn off all the lights. Alexa wasn’t able to understand to turn off everything, it likes one item at a time but google was able to understand. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Mostly very good
customer_reviews.text: Starting with the price, this is a great deal. 4 smart plugs for what 1 normally costs. The setup is simple and straight forward. It integrates well with Alexa. I had a couple glitches where they wouldn't turn on but by deactivating and reactivating (using the app) it seams to have fixed it. My concern is security. You have to give your wifi password to the app and that is always risky. I'd like some more assurance that no one else has access to my data or my network. Overall I do recommend this but understand what you are doing.
customer_reviews.author: jf

customer_reviews.title: About time.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and I love it for those places where you can't get to but want some light or what have you. Years ago in California state fair in 1972 they had there what they called a Smart Home, it was wonderful. I never thought I could have some of what they show so many years ago now. So, I guess my thought was why has it taken so long to get to us, but now a bit of it is here, go for it. SO we can get the rest of what men dreamed of so many years ago and had a working model of it.
customer_reviews.author: collette batten

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and better than other namebrands
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use these with my Google home setup. I truly love the integration. I can automate things that I don't want to replace, like my lamp, my computer monitor, I also use one in the kitchen for a burner that I can shut off if I am cooking but need to step away a minute. My only issue with this has been using the countdown timer. I haven't caught a hang of it, but I also have persisted on it. I successfully used it to schedule an on and off time which was seemless. I hope the app becomes more intuitive overtime! P.s. kicks wemo's butt it's easier to setup!
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: I received these yesterday afternoon. The set up was super easy and everything is working! How trying to figure out what other devices I want to voice control so I can order those wall switches. Ceiling fans, wall switches.. So far I have 8 things I can control via Alexa. More too come.
customer_reviews.author: Redbaron1701

customer_reviews.title: Great But Consistently Broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 2-pack - one worked perfectly. Easy set up and great response time. The second one wouldn't power on. I returned them and ordered a second 2-pack. Same thing. One worked perfectly and one would continually cycle on and off before powering off. I gave up. Good product but two faulty ones in a row is a deal-breaker. UPDATE: The manufacturer sent me a replacement set after I wrote this review. Both plugs worked and I did not have to return the last set I bought so now I have 3 working units.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Plugs are probably fine, but the Smart Life App is a problem
customer_reviews.text: I can not review the actual product since the Smart Life App is the issue. I have tried 16 or 17 verification codes and keep getting the error, "Wrong authentication code, please re-enter". If you request a resend of the code it takes 15 or 20 minutes to receive the e-mail with the new code, just to get the error message again. This is approaching insanity, I keep trying, but get the same results. So much for home automation, at least Alexa tells me a joke and the weather. These will be going back on the first thing smoking.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Carmack

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up but work great
customer_reviews.text: These are a little complicated to set up. The instructions need to be more detailed or maybe worded differently. I legit thought they didn’t work at first. After many times of trying I finally got them set up. Linking them to my echo dot after this was not too bad. They work great. I like that you can set timers for different times everyday of the week. I am using two of them to control lighting on my aquariums.
customer_reviews.author: Mzbethhnc

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a remote light switch, and it has been less than reliable. It will power cycle randomly, sometimes multiple times within a minute, causing the light to turn off for 1 second. I can't imagine relying on this for an appliance or anything more serious than a light. It works well enough as a sort of wake-up light; setting a timer or automation on the app is easy enough. The app is also poorly designed, and is clearly a ripoff (or was ripped off, not sure which) of a similar smart home app, with only the colors being different. It also makes an audible clicking noise when the outlet turns on or off.
customer_reviews.author: jesse g

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these plugs since I received the Alexa and dot for a gift. I will say it was a bit difficult to set up because you have to set them up when you are on a slower wifi than what I had. I had to call AT&T because my slower network was not showing up in my searches for my networks. They reset everything and once I signed into the slower network I could set them up with no issues at all. Very easy!! I am so excited to say "Alexa turn off my bedroom light" etc. You'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Chestnutt

customer_reviews.title: Great plugs, well designed app. All Work consistently
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, app to control the plugs is well designed and seems stable. Only 3 of 4 plugs worked which is annoying. Update: HugoAI proactively reaches out to offer me a pair of replacements so all is well! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Do Not buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These automated plug outlets were amazing when I first bought them however with the new app update they ask for your camera and photos and I cannot get mine to connect anymore so they are useless to me and I have them all over my house I have to switch to a different brand I go onto their website and onto their app and cannot get any help horrible horrible do not buy these
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Takes up space
customer_reviews.text: These plugs take up the space of near by outlets. I can plug in another plug if it is a smaller plug without the 3rd prong. This is a very annoying situation, since this buy can take up 3 spots on a power strip, and both outlets on the walls. It really reduces the number of available outlets. It is a frustrating situation. The devices seem to work, which is amazing. But the form factor is SO disappointing. Everyone knows the basic design of an outlet. Why can't these be designed with that in mind?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hollocher

customer_reviews.title: A little fussy app, but once set is good to go.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought these for holiday lighting timers, but have used them for many months now for other house lighting. They were a little fussy getting recognized by Alexa and Google, but once fully set up it is easy to just forget them and now it is simply a matter of 'Alexa, turn on...' with no further issues. Will likely purchase more of them in the future for other devices.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: A royal pain to get it added to the network. Once added, I can control the switched on the "smart life" app. But it is not found by alexa after many iterations, installs, uninstalls etc. Ate up half a day. Should have never tried. I tried it on my google nest as well, there the switches show up but nest cannot control them. Go figure. A friend has it working on alexa, no such luck for me. I hear customer service is not existent so I will lick my wounds and just move on.
customer_reviews.author: P.k

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadgets
customer_reviews.text: Listen, we are all for finding great little gadgets that aid in simplicity around the house- but things that won’t record our conversations or freak us out with A.I. Type knowledge. These little do-hickies are great. Plug em in, down load the app, voila. I do wish they had an option for square ones, so that we could use them in our recessed outlet boxes. That would be stellar. We used them outside even for Christmas lights with zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to work!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fairly tech-savvy person, and I could not get this plug to work at all. The app was terrible and the paper instructions were full of typos. Finally I gave up and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: These work like a charms
customer_reviews.text: Have them all over our house. Created Zones and use our phone app to turn on any zone from anywhere even when we travel to other states. Easy set up. Love this product and the decision to buy. No more running all over the house and unplugging lights or turning them off. Just select a zone or zones and push your phone and they are on and off. Saves me at least 5 minutes each night. Great to know I can turn on all the lights before I get home or when I'm away.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E. Cook

customer_reviews.title: easy setup and works reliably
customer_reviews.text: Setup is easy with SmartLife. I also own TanTan smart plugs and these are much smaller, taking less space. I mostly use these plugs to turn on and off floor lamps through either SmartLife or Echo Dot. They have been working reliably. I take off one star because they are not UL certified.
customer_reviews.author: ts320

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t work. Can’t connect via app even that the app find the device. Waste of money and time. Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Longo

customer_reviews.title: Great wi-fi solution to control ights
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem controlling the switching of my living room lamps with my Echo Dot. Tried Wi-FI light bulbs and they were a total bust. They kept losing the setting to my Eero every 24 hours. Returned those to Amazon and purchased these Smart Plugs. Easy set-up. Maintains the Wi-Fi connection (after 3 weeks no reset) and works perfectly with Alexa. Will be buying additional plugs for similar type application.
customer_reviews.author: HSNYC

customer_reviews.title: Finicky!
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money! No matter what I do they will not connect to WiFi this making them entirely useless. I would have been better off buying old fashioned timers. Buyer beware these don’t work at all! Update: I finally got one to work after an hour of screwing with my router and the app. These things are finicky as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be any easier to setup!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much for the price, but was surprised at house easy these were to set up, and get to work with my Amazon Echo. It comes with small instructions. By small I mean multi page smaller than two square inches, so get out the readers. But I followed the instructions, and had two outlets set up, working with the app, and working with my Amazon Echo. Now I don’t have to go outside to turn off my Christmas lights!
customer_reviews.author: SMarcz

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues/ resolved
customer_reviews.text: They had a hard time connecting at first but I thought it was just me because then they started working great for about a month or two. But now they won’t connect to anything and just stopped working randomly. Super disappointed. Updating my review because they did contact me and send me replacement plugs. These ones seem to be working just fine. I appreciate the costumer service for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: These made turning on the Christmas tree every day a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting a little Christmas Grinch-like about turning on the Christmas tree and the other lights. However, I bought these on a whim and plugged all things Christmas related into them. The app was easy to use and the directions were clear. Within 5 minutes, I had the Christmas lights at the tip of my fingertips. Turning them on and off took a second, and I could do it from anywhere in the house. I'm definitely going to use these more!
customer_reviews.author: Angeline G.

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I would have given all 5 Star ratings except for the size of the Smart Outlets. They are approximately 2 inches in diameter and hence it's impossible to use 2 in a normal outlet. They are also at least an inch deep so they do make the plug and switch combination stick out quite a ways from the outlet. They also make power strips less usable because they block the other outlets. When installed, the switches work exactly as stated on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fox

customer_reviews.title: HUGOAI WiFI Smart Plug - Easy to Install and Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is just want I needed to finish up our decorations for the holiday. One of these plugs actually runs the HO train and anyone can say "Alexa turn on the Santa Fe" and the starts and with "Alexa turn off the Santa Fe" the train stops. I have set a timer to start and stop the train. These Smart Plugs were easy to install and Alexa had no trouble finding them, it was all easy.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Riker

customer_reviews.title: These things are nifty
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to turn on things like a small heater or kettle. Saves me time in the morning as I fill my kettle at night turn it on and the plug does the rest. I set it to turn on 10 minutes before my alarm so when i get up water is boiled and ready to make coffee. Happy days.
customer_reviews.author: bill s preston esquire

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I have all 4 of the units being used for lighting and it is nice to just say "Alexa, Lights on" to turn them all on or to say "Alexa, turn on torch lights" and have just that light going on. I have tried other "Plug-type" units and so far found these work wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Brother William

customer_reviews.title: Shut down your mobile network access to set up
customer_reviews.text: Bit of advice. If you are using a smart phone to set these up turn off your mobile network access as it will force your phone down on to your 2.5 network speed and connect easily. Took me a few weeks and support from HugoAI to figure this out. Hugo didn't tell me this either. It just clicked that my mobile access was probably higher than 2.5 and that's why I couldn't connect the plugs. Connected fine after that
customer_reviews.author: makita975

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. I bought them Initially for Christmas, our tree is always in the corner and every night it was kind of a pain to unplug the tree. I’m knocking over ornaments, dropping needles all over the floor just to get to the outlet. enter Alexa and her fancy little outlets!! Absolutely loved it, can’t wait to try it on something else now that the tree is gone
customer_reviews.author: Yabby02

customer_reviews.title: They work and they're cheap
customer_reviews.text: They work and they're cheap. My only difficult was in getting them to blink for the setup using the Smart Life app. Following the app instructions, I turned them on for 10 seconds, then off, then held the button for 5 seconds. Nothing. So I pressed on and off rapidly many times, and finally the light began to blink. The connection to the wifi router was then very fast, quicker than other smart plugs I have used. They both work reliably now.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoma Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The product is not functioning whatsoever after 3 days. Tried to unplug the unit and reset it somehow, but nothing happens.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: One of two working
customer_reviews.text: Like otheres one is working and the other is not. Will return if i dont hear from seller UPDATE - i will change my rating to 4 stars because of the customer service i received. I was sent a replacement plug and it is functioning. Now we will wait and see if the product lasts, but at the moment they are working as expected and i love the ease of setting them up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Low Power, Poor Connections, Only One Per Outlet
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging and instructions. Appears to be well made. However, they need to be close to your router (or extender) to work consistently. I have the highest rated, highest power router on the market and these still hand difficulty being recognized after initial setup. These do work well with SmartHouse, and other major market apps like Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Tom O

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Simple set up but you have to read the instructions :) Download app Plug in Set up WiFi Connect Alexa Good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Miketrack

customer_reviews.title: Use the slow blinking installation method...
customer_reviews.text: It was frustrating at first to install these using the fast blinking method. By accident I discovered the slow blinking method, for which I didn't see any documentation; however, I really didn't read it because the print was so small. Using the slow blinking method was smooth. These work well with my Google Home setup. I am happy with the results and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup with Wi-Fi. Works great with Alexa and has the added bonus of every outlet can be scheduled when you want them to turn OFF and ON. Software has groups such as Living room, dining room, bedroom and you can add groups but what I have no found is how to turn on ALL groups or ALL devices in a group. I have seen it done with Google but not Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Risler

customer_reviews.title: You must turn off 5Ghz to get them to connect.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it four stars because you have to turn off 5Ghz to connect to 24 GHz your router in order to set these up, if you leave 5Ghz on they will not connect to 24 GHz. Was kind of a pain on my Lynksys Mesh router. Other than that they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam_Sneed

customer_reviews.title: Bought these items twice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I found these items best by value for my needs. First time I bought and share one by one with my wife, she using in her office one and I using in bedroom second. My last order bring to my home some more smarty stuff. Last two outlets set for lights in living room. The software works great, simple and usable.
customer_reviews.author: dmitry koboy

customer_reviews.title: Defective or not not ready for the market just yet
customer_reviews.text: It does what is advertised but mine has issues from the get go. It is relatively easy to install but the two I installed to a lamp, they will keep turning on and off randomly by itself. Don't want to try the other two and am preparing to ship them back.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Elias

customer_reviews.title: Works with google home perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have this hooked up to my speakers and chromecast. Im not a fan of ambient mode on chromecast and Im not able to turn off my computer screen monitor so the next best thing is to plug my chromecast into this switch and have it choke the life out of my chromecast, wirelessly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Updated review:
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased these twice now. I love them, being able to turn things off and on from anywhere via phone or google home. The second time, one didn’t connect/work, and the company sent me a new one immediately. Their product is fantastic, at a great price, and their customer service is amazing. I can’t recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: Took me 15-20 minutes to setup the devices with the friendly interface app, and hook it up with Alexa. The most time was taken up trying to figure out why the devices wouldn't connect to my 5Ghz wifi network (They only work on the 2.4 Ghz network) Been using it for about 4 days now, and works great with Alexa voice control, as well as app control
customer_reviews.author: Ragu

customer_reviews.title: did not work good with my Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I returned because sometimes Alexa will hear me and turn on the light and sometimes did not hear me at all, and end screaming to Alexa ...turn on the F ...light !! but other lights that are connected with Alexa they work well.
customer_reviews.author: claudio cassinelli

customer_reviews.title: Defective outlet
customer_reviews.text: After using for a little over a week one of the two outlets stopped working, ipad shows it offline and with no button light. The other outlet is working just fine so not a WiFi issue. Disappointing as this was a early Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Carl Warych

customer_reviews.title: Update:  Working again after October 10 outage
customer_reviews.text: The outage that began October 10 has been corrected, and the plugs are working well again. Be aware that the size of the plug turns a double outlet into a single one. We use these with a power strip to preserve outlet space.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Berry

customer_reviews.title: Semi-easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out that I needed to use the optional installation method, the rest were easy to install, and all work well. One has a pipe-filled bathroom wall between it and the Echo, but it receives signals reliably. They leave just enough room to use another standard cord plug next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond disappointed w/ product. Not use friendly. Cannot connect to Alexa. Third party app involved.
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Operates on your 2.4 ghz Wi-Fi signal/network and works with Alexa!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, programmable, voice control. I enjoy all the features that come with these plugs. I have mine set for voice control with Alexa and on timers for morning wakeup and evening bedtime. The plugs can be voice controlled by any of my home's echo dots. The plugs operate on my 2.4 ghz Wi-Fi signal/network while my echo dots operate on the 5ghz Wi-Fi signal. They communicate very well with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Bracm

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition onto the Alexe enabled system
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love that we can control the lights with these smart outlets by voice control. We used to have wireless outlets that were controlled by a switch but we had to constantly reprogram them that it made it a big hassle to use them. These have saved us some time as we can turn on any outlet from anywhere in the house by voice.
customer_reviews.author: demoneye66

customer_reviews.title: They work perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have them in my lights around the house and a TV so I can turn on the lights and TV when I am not home. It took me a few tried to connect the first one but after I figured that one out, the rest were smooth. I just got them but great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smart plugs that make things easier!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smart plugs. Easy to set up with Alexa through Smart Life. We placed lamps throughout the house with these plugs and can easily turn them off and on when needed, but most importantly, can whenever we are out of town. Extra Convenience and security!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new mini smart plugs. This is the first time ive used this technology and i absolutely love it. Of course like everything, theres a learning curve but the product seems to work great. My service delivery had problems but nothing to do with this company and EVERYTHING to do with Ontrac. If youve ever had them deliver anything to uou, im sure you know what i mean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to use with Alexa!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to turn the lights on in the morning automatically as an alarm. I connected it to Alexa and it’s all done on a schedule. It was relatively easy to set up with the app and connect to Alexa through the Alexa app. If you use it on a power strip like I did, you won’t be able to plug anything in directly next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Caution...this product promotes laziness.  It’s GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I got 4 outlets. I was happy to see that I could put a regular 3 outlet connector into the smart outlet and run a few lamps off of one outlet. It makes me feel like I’m getting a bargain. I tell Alexa to turn my lights on, my fan, the lights in the second bedroom and my Xmas lights...when I set them up. It makes me feel so lazy that I ordered an iRobot to take care of my floors for me lol. I can’t afford a maid....this is the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Username and password acceptance issues
customer_reviews.text: First, the people in China who manufactured these items need to go back to school..."sing in" should never be confused for the "sign in" function ( perhaps it should be changed to a simple "log in" .....the technical writing to workability for the user is quite literally useless....The device does not accept the password and username that was established during the initiation process presumably so that it could be "synced' with Echo Dot. This is a horrible application device!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great way into home automation
customer_reviews.text: My house is decked with smart home devices. I just needed a cheap way to remotely turn a 3D printer off and schedule operating time for a HEPA purifier. These worked perfectly for my needs. It would have been nice if it tied directly with my Wink system but for some thing simple, this was more than sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Tran

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!!!!! DON'T BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: What an embarrassment to give someone a Christmas gift that doesn't work. This company should be ashamed of themselves. The app is cryptic an not user friendly and the instruction book is microscopic. What a joke!!!! I would think a smart product would be able to install into the app that it's built for however this garbage can't even find itself when you scan for it. Needless to say I'm beyond frustrated so here we sit on Christmas day with a gift that sucks and nothing more that trash.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Works with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: These very inexpensive smart plugs are the best I’ve tried. They connected instantly to my wifi and with my Alexa app and so far they have done exactly what I ask. I highly recommend these over the Wemo miniplugs which were much more difficult to connect for me at 3 times the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Replacements worked
customer_reviews.text: Update 11/13/18 I had tried contacting the company multiple times but got no response. After my review, I was contacted & offered free replacements. I finally got them to work & am happy with them so far. These did not work for me at all. Ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBee

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: You need an outlet turned on or off and don't feel like touching it? These do the trick. Works with Alexa and their own app, so easy to control. The app allows groups to be setup and can control more than one with a single command.
customer_reviews.author: 'Cenzo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We got these to automate our Christmas lights this year and they work great! The app is super easy to use and set up only took about a minute per outlet. Now everything is on a timer and I don't even have to think about it! We'll see how long they hold up...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Syncs to Geeni, can't apply to Google Assistant
customer_reviews.text: I love these light switches, but I wish they could hook up to my existing Geeni App more flawlessly so I could sync then to Google Assistant via the Geeni app as opposed to having to download the Smart life app and integrate then through that way.
customer_reviews.author: TimiMcCann

customer_reviews.title: EASY CHEAP SMART PLUG!
customer_reviews.text: These were so easy to use! I bought them to make my bedroom lamps smart, and so I can turn them on and off with my echo without having to get out of bed at night. These were easy to setup, and work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Saves trips running up and downstairs...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for multiple igems. I used them if I forget to turn something off downstairs. Saves many trips running up and down stairs when something was left on by accident. Also, great for playing tricks on the kids by turning off and on electronics and lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast, well designed and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Low delay in on/off commands via Alexa. Blends in nicely with white walls. Schedule works smoothly too. Easy to setup and integration with smart home.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to set up & works great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have our adjustable bed, bedroom lights, bathroom lights, and air purifier set up on these! Don’t you hate it when you get all comfortable in your bed and realize you left the bathroom light on?! Problem fixed! Try it! You won’t be sorry!

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: The company contacted me. They were very nice and helpful, they send me a new pair of plugs and it works great. Excellent customer service.Dont waste your money, they don't work, tried both, spend hours watching videos and reading how to connect them but nothing. It doesn't recognize the plug as a device.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: 3/4 work perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give 4 stars, but the last one in the pack that I just got out was DOA. I synced it up, super easy, but then plugged in the lamp and the outlet is dead. Totally bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Spardan

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I've got about 30 of these smart outlets and they are excellent. They work fantastic, are super easy to setup and organize, and a good value for the money. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimhova

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and integrate into a smart home!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I bought another set of these, and the second set hasn't been as good. They keep turning on and off randomly, not sure why but it's a bit jarring when it happens. Original: Super easy to set up and add to my Google Home ecosystem!
customer_reviews.author: A. Stream

customer_reviews.title: difficult to connect
customer_reviews.text: 1st of all. I was supposed to receive 4 plugs in the package only contained 2. Secondly, it's almost impossible to connect these plugs to the Wi-Fi. In fact, I am still trying and trust me when I say I am good at it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Berg

customer_reviews.title: Kinda a pain to set up
customer_reviews.text: It says it works with the echo dots but it’s a royal pain in the... to set it up. It’s only over wifi, over all it does what it says it going to do. They are kinda on the bigger side so that kinda sucks. But for the price you can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: These might work but I got sick of trying to pair them
customer_reviews.text: They are cheap enough, but I never could get them to pair to use with my Google Home system.
customer_reviews.author: gulfcoastPnut

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to link
customer_reviews.text: I could not get these to link up despite multiple attempts. I became very frustrated. I didnr consider these user friendly with google. May work better with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Allbecuz2peopfellnluv

customer_reviews.title: These plugs are great.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I also bought an Amazon plug which integrates right away with Alexa. But I think this one works better. And At a smaller price.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Casey

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy installation and setup
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all... Easy to setup and to use. Each plug was up in running in less than 2 minutes. Integration with the Smart Life app was simple.
customer_reviews.author: pack9and6

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and great product
customer_reviews.text: I had it setup and was working for 1 year. It suddenly disappeared from the list of devices in the app and now wouldn't connect. I sent a note to customer service. The customer service is great. They sent me a new unit immediately and it worked like a charm. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: CoolKouls

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected and app works fine
customer_reviews.text: Plugs are not too big and simple design. App works and has all the basic functions including scheduler, timer, and on / off. My WiFi network has not been hacked as far as I know so hopefully good on IoT security aspect, too.
customer_reviews.author: DMJP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Mostly used for lamp fixtures. Google Assistant worked sometimes but not an issue for me. Didn't try Alexa. The electronic component itself is exemplary. The app from the ply store required to operate this product is flawless. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: legobeez

customer_reviews.title: Serve their purpose, but not without bugs
customer_reviews.text: They worked as i needed them to throughout the time I’ve had them, but it hasn’t been a year and they’ve been giving me trouble. One of them just stopped working altogether a few months ago, and now something with the software appears to have changed only allowing the use of a 2.4ghz network which is so bizarre all of a sudden. I’m annoyed and I’m just gonna have to order some new ones I suppose and I think I’ll look for a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin W.

customer_reviews.title: 2.4 Ghz Only
customer_reviews.text: Does not support 5ghz frequency so I can't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Snapdragon

customer_reviews.title: Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried to connect this to Alexa and the Smart life Ap. Doesnt seem to work. Ive contacted At&t and they said My speed is good. So i believe i just wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: Demetra Way

customer_reviews.title: I can’t get them to work...
customer_reviews.text: Every time I try to pair it with my Alexa or google home, it keeps saying device not found....I’ve tried several times. I have even scanned the code and still says can’t find device.... Maybe I just got duds 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: It’s very good product but not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: After you have done the installation the product works as expected, but the installation is tricky, should be just follow a wizard
customer_reviews.author: Verny

customer_reviews.title: BACK TO COLLEGE NECESSARY
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it. She was spilt having Alexa at home and attachments. Took her but a few minutes to connect and now she can turn off alarm clocks, lights and computer. Sent fast and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: ADOPT -A- MOM

customer_reviews.title: never got the voice control to work...
customer_reviews.text: After lots of time spent trying to get the lights to come on and off with voice activation to my Google Home Mini, i gave up. The plug does turn on-off when using the App on my phone, but that didn't do me much good as I wanted the voice control. I looked up info, and various fixes, but never got it working, even thought i set it up with my Google Home app. It says "it appears those lights are not set-up".... I have two plugs, one is still in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues with this due to my Wi-Fi - you MUST have 2.4G of Wi-Fi to support this - I now have this connected to my google hub and now this is voice activated- Love it
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Setup can be a struggle, but it's a functional smart plug.
customer_reviews.text: The app has no support for it, so setting it up can be a nightmare. It only looks for 2.4GHz bandwidth, but it relies on the wifi name. If you have routers that also have 5.0Ghz, you need to temporarily disable it. Using it after it's set up is fine though.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatable with my wifi
customer_reviews.text: Did not work with my internet connection, wish they would do a better job of making that clear before purchase. I’m pretty good with tech stuff and I could not get these set up! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: amber

product_meta.title: HUGOAI Smart Plug, WiFi Smart Outlet, Works with Alexa, Google Home & IFTTT, No Hub Required, ETL Listed, Remote Control Smart Home Devices, Smart Socket Only 2.4GHz WiFi (4 Pieces)
feature_bullets: ➤Manage Your Smart Home from Anywhere: Simply control your plugged-in lights and appliances with HUGOAI Plugs by using the free app from the bed, the café, or the Waikiki. Only needs 2.4GHz Wifi. No hub or subscription required.

➤Voice Control with Alexa & the Google Assistant: Paired the HUGOAI Smart Plug with Alexa or the Google Assistan, enjoy the hands-free voice control over your smart home. Turn your lights, appliances, or your entire room on or off using just your voice.

➤Set Schedules & Automatize Your Home: Let a cup of warm fresh coffee be ready for you in the morning before you wake up. Schedule your lamps to turn on at sunset and turn off automatically at 11:00 PM. Use the group function to control a entire room with just one single tap.

➤Share with Families & More Fun with IFTTT: Share the Wifi plugs in your smart home among family members in a minute. Paired with IFTTT, your lamps, coffee maker or your other appliances will automatically turn on when you get near home or off when you leave.

➤Buy with Confidence: HUGOAI Smart Outlet with ETL FCC RoHS listed ensures complete protection. We provide a 12-Months Warranty and Lifetime Customer Service. HUGOAI team is always standing by to help. Note: 2.4GHz Wifi 801.11n only.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars888 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
